hadiths.text: Buraidah Al-Aslami narrated that :the Prophet said: "Give glad tiding to those who walk to the Masajid in the dark; of a complete light on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الْعِشَاءِ وَالْفَجْرِ فِي الْجَمَاعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: : What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of Isha And Fajr In Congregation
